num=c(86,96,91,84,113,107,86,95,90,88)

  aa=paste("C:\\Users\\TSR\\Desktop\\文字辨識\\testDigits\\",i,"_",0:num[i+1],".txt",sep="")
  bb=rep(i,num[i+1]+1)
  cc=0:num[i+1]

  v2=c(v2,cc)
  v=c(v,aa)
}
v
tt=matrix(0,ncol=1026,nrow=946)
for (i in 1:length(v)){
  x=readLines(v[i])
  x1=strsplit(x,split="")
  x1=unlist(x1)
  x1=as.numeric(x1)
  tt[i,3:1026]=x1
}
tt[,1]=v1
tt[,2]=v2
################開始判定
h=0
ff=c()
for (i in 1:946){
  for (j in 1:1934){
    ff[j]=sum((tt[i,3:1026]-xx[j,3:1026])^2)
    }
  if  (xx[which.min(ff),1]==tt[i,1]) h=h+1
}
h
